title: Plat 1 aggressive mid laner looking for a serious team
body:
IGN: Cute Little Ahri

I have lots of free time on my hands at the moment and am able to play around 85% of the AP champion pool.
I am able to adapt to new play styles if necessary, and I'm friendly :D

replies.body: hey I have a team I'm looking to get going again that's currently ranked S4 if you want to join
